# Portable Hand Held Scanning Systems - Ultrasonic
Requests For Proposal
=====================

### Solicitation Number and Details
* Solicitation Number: W6369-24-A015
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: April 26, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: June 7, 2024 2:00 PM EDT

### Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to acquire Portable Hand Held Scanning Systems - Ultrasonic with the requirements as stated below. Vendors must submit their proposals in either English or French, the official languages of Canada.

The successful bidder will be expected to deliver 30 Handheld Point of Care Ultrasound Scanner (POCUS) Systems to the Canadian Forces Health Services Group (CF H Svcs Gp) within or prior to 30 days of contract award. The systems must be compatible with iOS, Android, or proprietary devices, and include an all-inclusive three-year warranty for all Point of Care Ultrasound (POCUS) transducers.

The contract includes an option for additional purchases: 45 Handheld Point of Care Ultrasound POCUS Systems, 30 Operating Training courses via MS Teams, and three-year warranty for all Point of Care Ultrasound (POCUS) transducers.

### Delivery and Training
The Contractor must deliver the systems to the Canadian Forces Health Services Group (CF H Svcs Gp) at the designated address, with all the necessary documentation and training. The Contractor will also be responsible for five (5) Operator Training Sessions via MS Teams.

### Contract Terms and Duration
The contract period will commence on the date of contract award and shall continue until March 31, 2032.

### Important Notes
* There are no security requirements associated with this bid
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* All documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada
